meta_data.title: Best Christmas Party Outfits 2019 - What to Wear to Holiday Parties
meta_data.description: From velvet jackets to bold-shouldered party dresses, here are 20 not-so-basic Christmas party outfit ideas for giving festive a whole new name this holiday season.

meta_data.sailthru.excerpt: A little black dress or Le Smoking suit is always on par for the party scene, but who says holiday dressing has to be so cut and dry? From pink jackets to leather dresses to velvet minis, here are some not-so-basic ideas for giving festive a whole new meaning this...
